titleStmt.title: New prayers and meditations with pious exhortations for fast-days pursuant to Their Majesties King William and Queen Mary's injunctions to suppress irreligion and prophaneness / by Tho. Watts, Vicar of Orpington and St. Mary Crey in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Watts, Thomas, 1665-1739.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
